articles.title: Argentina's farm leaders worry about new economy chief
articles.description: Argentina's farm sector leaders said on Monday they were worried about the naming of an economy minister who has close ties to Vice President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner who pushed higher export taxes on agricultural goods when she was president from 2007-2015.

articles.title: Argentina's new economy chief sworn in, tries to calm nervous markets
articles.description: Argentina's new economy minister Silvina Batakis was sworn in on Monday and quickly moved to calm markets that slid after the shock resignation of her predecessor on fears his exit would spark a shift towards more populist policies and state spending.

articles.title: EMERGING MARKETS-Turkish lira slips as inflation surges, Argentina in focus after Guzman exit
articles.description: Emerging market stocks hit their lowest in nearly two months on Monday, while soaring Turkish inflation, political turmoil in Argentina and growing recession worries hurt currencies already under pressure from a strong dollar. The MSCI EM equities index fell to its lowest since May 12 before paring some losses.
